title: No in client reform card.
body: Recently got a chat restriction but no reform card.  Is there some place i can check it to see what in the world i could have possibly said wrong to offend one of many people in this game who arent sensitive to brash comments at all who report for nothing.

replies.body:
You have a reform card. Log into the client to see it.

If you can't find it, I can post it for you.

If you received a chat restriction but have no reform card when logging into the client, then you were likely banned due to a manual review. To get a reform card, you will need to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask for one.
